Package thobe.widgets.decoratorPanel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Screenshot
    An interface whose instances of its implementing classes are able to offer an screenshot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Decorator
    A class that can be used to decorate an panel.
    DecoratorPanel
    A Panel that allows to decorate a component with multiple Decorators.
    DisableDecorator
    A Decorator that decorates a component in a manner as it will be if the component is disabled.
    ProgressPanel
    Class/ Panel that will decorate a given Component with a waiting indicator (spinning dial) if the Panel is disabled and optionally an progress bar.
    WaitingDecorator
    A Decorator indicating a behavior of a panel that is locked since it waits for an long running background-task.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DecoratorPanelException
